TEXT.English: Your unit finds a cub, that could be tamed.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds a cub, that could be tamed.
TEXT.German: Your unit finds a cub, that could be tamed.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds a cub, that could be tamed.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds a cub, that could be tamed.

TEXT.English: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.
TEXT.French: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.
TEXT.German: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.
TEXT.Italian: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.
TEXT.Spanish: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.

TEXT.English: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a purse.
TEXT.French: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a purse.
TEXT.German: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a purse.
TEXT.Italian: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a purse.
TEXT.Spanish: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a purse.

TEXT.English: A wild animal defends its home.
TEXT.French: A wild animal defends its home.
TEXT.German: A wild animal defends its home.
TEXT.Italian: A wild animal defends its home.
TEXT.Spanish: A wild animal defends its home.

TEXT.English: You are not the only one to hunt here. Goblin scout confronts you.
TEXT.French: You are not the only one to hunt here. Goblin scout confronts you.
TEXT.German: You are not the only one to hunt here. Goblin scout confronts you.
TEXT.Italian: You are not the only one to hunt here. Goblin scout confronts you.
TEXT.Spanish: You are not the only one to hunt here. Goblin scout confronts you.

TEXT.English: Dressing wild animals your hunters gather a potent poisonous glands
TEXT.French: Dressing wild animals your hunters gather a potent poisonous glands
TEXT.German: Dressing wild animals your hunters gather a potent poisonous glands
TEXT.Italian: Dressing wild animals your hunters gather a potent poisonous glands
TEXT.Spanish: Dressing wild animals your hunters gather a potent poisonous glands

TEXT.English: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.
TEXT.French: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.
TEXT.German: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.
TEXT.Italian: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.
TEXT.Spanish: Clearing out an animal den your scout perfected his taming skills.

TEXT.English: Your unit find means to provide for himself in the wilds.
TEXT.French: Your unit find means to provide for himself in the wilds.
TEXT.German: Your unit find means to provide for himself in the wilds.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit find means to provide for himself in the wilds.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit find means to provide for himself in the wilds.

TEXT.English: After predators were cleared out more animals returned to their natural habitat.
TEXT.French: After predators were cleared out more animals returned to their natural habitat.
TEXT.German: After predators were cleared out more animals returned to their natural habitat.
TEXT.Italian: After predators were cleared out more animals returned to their natural habitat.
TEXT.Spanish: After predators were cleared out more animals returned to their natural habitat.

TEXT.French: Poisonous snake maimed your unit.

TEXT.English: A wild animal pack defends their home.
TEXT.French: A wild animal pack defends their home.
TEXT.German: A wild animal pack defends their home.
TEXT.Italian: A wild animal pack defends their home.
TEXT.Spanish: A wild animal pack defends their home.

TEXT.English: Proving his ability to deal with wild animals, the tale of your hunter's deeds travels around Erebus.
TEXT.French: Proving his ability to deal with wild animals, the tale of your hunter's deeds travels around Erebus.
TEXT.German: Proving his ability to deal with wild animals, the tale of your hunter's deeds travels around Erebus.
TEXT.Italian: Proving his ability to deal with wild animals, the tale of your hunter's deeds travels around Erebus.
TEXT.Spanish: Proving his ability to deal with wild animals, the tale of your hunter's deeds travels around Erebus.

TEXT.English: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jewel.
TEXT.French: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jewel.
TEXT.German: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jewel.
TEXT.Italian: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jewel.
TEXT.Spanish: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jewel.

TEXT.English: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jade braclet.
TEXT.French: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jade braclet.
TEXT.German: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jade braclet.
TEXT.Italian: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jade braclet.
TEXT.Spanish: Within the den your unit finds some gnawed bones and a jade braclet.

TEXT.English: Drooling, grinning maws, hard breath, twitchy moves... Something is wrong.
TEXT.French: Drooling, grinning maws, hard breath, twitchy moves... Something is wrong.
TEXT.German: Drooling, grinning maws, hard breath, twitchy moves... Something is wrong.
TEXT.Italian: Drooling, grinning maws, hard breath, twitchy moves... Something is wrong.
TEXT.Spanish: Drooling, grinning maws, hard breath, twitchy moves... Something is wrong.

TEXT.English: Within the den your unit finds a reeking animal carcass. Hopefully it's not dangerous.
TEXT.French: Within the den your unit finds a reeking animal carcass. Hopefully it's not dangerous.
TEXT.German: Within the den your unit finds a reeking animal carcass. Hopefully it's not dangerous.
TEXT.Italian: Within the den your unit finds a reeking animal carcass. Hopefully it's not dangerous.
TEXT.Spanish: Within the den your unit finds a reeking animal carcass. Hopefully it's not dangerous.
